pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains the source code of Dimemas simulator, its graphical user interface and the Paraver to Dimemas trace translator, 'prv2dim'. You can find the old Dimemas trace format (.trf) to new format (.dim) translator 'trf2dim' until Dimemas package version 5.3.0

use.flag: if enabled, idle CPU regions are computed as CPU consumption in the accouting stats
if enabled defined Dimemas considers initial startups on MPI_Irecv functions
if enabled Dimemas uses the original protocol to manage links
if enabled Dimemas puts logical receive time when MPI_Wait is called (not on MPI_Irecv)
